other_tests.findings: Diffuse monomorphous infiltrate of atypical lymphocytes with sparing of the uppermost dermis; majority of lymphoid cells positive for the B-cell marker CD20; presence of immunoglobulin heavy chain gene rearrangement.
Hypercellular marrow with small lymphoid aggregates of large pleomorphic cells.
Demonstrated a mass in the right axilla and adenopathy of the right axillary, right hilar, and right inguinal areas; spleen slightly enlarged.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat CT scans showed resolution of the axillary mass and adenopathy.

other_tests.findings: The patient’s white blood cell count increased from 0.587 × 10^3/µL to 4 × 10^3/µL.
